members.description: Remove review relations and unmatched features in secondary dataset.
members.name: Conflate Post Ops

members.description: The criterion for the RemoveElementsVisitor above
members.name: Remove Elements Visitor Criterion

members.description: The tag merging strategy to use
members.name: Tag Merger

members.description: The way joiner to use to rejoin ways split during cleaning and conflation matching
members.name: WayJoiner

members.description: If true, allows Attribute Conflation to modify the geometry of a reference road layer to accomodate bridge features.  If false, any bridge features represented in the secondary dataset, but not in the reference dataset will be lost.
members.name: Allow Reference Geometry Changes For Bridges

members.description: If true, the Duplicate Name Remover will always preserve the original name tag.  Otherwise, it will treat name and alternate name tags equally.
members.name: Preserve Original Name During Duplicate Name Removal

members.description: If true, allows Attribute Conflation to more aggressively rejoin ways with names and specific highway attribution into those with less specific highway attribution and no names.  Enabling this option may result in some false positive road joining.
members.name: Aggressively Join Unmerged Roads
